title: Five Muslim men arrested for forced conversion to Islam and gang rape of minor in Uttar Pradesh
selftext:
SOURCE - Telangana Today  

The incident was reported from the Hardi area of the district where a Hindu minor girl, staying in her grandmotherâ€™s house, was kidnapped, converted, and gang-raped by the accused.  

All five accused were arrested on Saturday.

The mother told police that her minor daughter, who was at her grandmotherâ€™s residence near Raji Chauraha, was kidnapped on February 2 by five youths from the neighbourhood, who converted her to their religion and gang-raped her.

A case was registered and Superintendent of Police (SP) Vrinda Shukla along with other officers visited the site and gave directions for evidence collection and stringent action against the accused. The girl said that the youths had threatened to kill her if she spoke up.

The accused â€” **Anees, Saddam, Mohiuddeen, Aleem and Baura** â€” were taken into custody and legal proceedings have been initiated against them under sections 363, 342, 376-D, 506, of IPC, the SP said on Sunday.

The girl will be sent for medical examination. 

​

https://preview.redd.it/6vrmrkinyfuc1.png?width=450&format=png&auto=webp&s=41dc18aa120c6b01c9454e6d4d841cd287ba4dcf
comments: Use Sharia law+Indian law for punishment

thanks for reading.

List of my muslim friends justifying it:

thanks for reading.

World would be lot better if people kept their d\*icks and religion in their pants. Praying for swift recovery of the victim and justice served to the rapists.
These Muslims should learn how to behave in society or we give them a choice. Death or conversion.

Because so far I couldn't find any names. If I get some I will add

Yeah you should. If you could tell me what my grandfather's sin ?
That is what it says
pay dowry.

[https://www.latestly.com/india/news/uttar-pradesh-shocker-five-youths-arrested-for-forced-conversion-and-gang-rape-of-dalit-minor-girl-in-bahraich-5892354.html](https://www.latestly.com/india/news/uttar-pradesh-shocker-five-youths-arrested-for-forced-conversion-and-gang-rape-of-dalit-minor-girl-in-bahraich-5892354.html)  
This is the source I can find  
never heard of it, can someone confirm credibility  
Horrific if true

Not your grandfather, but your great great grandfather could have committed horrible crimes for all you know you never even saw him ðŸ’€

It's the same here. Why would people take responsibility for the sins of their ancestors? Doesn't make any sense
Then delete that half a/ss list & do your work properlyÂ

Your data is for open support

What about behind closed support quarters support?
Cause they still commit crimes against humanity.
Very stereotypical mindset. Don't blame an entire community for the crimes of a few. It's like punishing an entire class because 1 student didn't complete homework
then reservation system also shouldnt exist ðŸ‘
Exactly

1) Where's your proof that many secretly support it?

2) Why would they openly support it when they know that their voter base isn't going to like it? why else do you think almost no (notice I said almost none) party  openly supports rapists?
https://preview.redd.it/4m3ln1s07guc1.png?width=3500&format=png&auto=webp&s=5c6895edc37f856ee833398f61d7175e118c458b
Anyone notice the influx of headlines with Muslim+crime in it?

Whats your proof of no support?

Iâ€™m not claiming anything, youâ€™re claiming something.

I merely asked a question. You can answer it or ignore it.

The burden of proof lies with you.

Source :

Dowry is haram bro !
Why would WA university discusses sharia law.
Chowk pe khadaa kr k beech me se aare se kaat Dena chaie sb k samne ab yehi justice hai

and just recently did mass rally in support of gangster and terrorist mukhtar ansari and those 2 child killer . Grand funeral . 

Bakrauddin owaisi is still crying about mukhtar ansari death in jail. Thanks for reading

please don't be a cop. You will accuse someone of secretly plotting to rob a bank and then ask him to prove that he wasn't doing it. 

You see the flaw in your logic?

Mehr is a stipulated gift which the husband pays to wife. It can also be used by wife as a nest egg in case the couple is divorced.

So tell me are Muslims bad for making someone imaam or Hindus who literally give hero welcomes to godmen when they are out on parole for rape crimes???

Ever heard of Hari Shankar Tiwari?? He was the first gangster in UP who mentored Mukhtar Ansari. He died a year back and guess who gets a state funeral?? Did Muslims demanded a state funeral for a gangster?? Did Yogi Aditya nath visited Mukhtars funeral or Hari Shankar Tiwaris funeral?? Any guess!!

Your confirmation bias falls short when majority flock on a gangsters funeral now does it??
You can dm mein if you have an authentic source ! Never heard about what you are saying !
Why are the same points that have been refuted countless times repeated so often?
In this source also, there are no citations or links to the police report or victims statement.

>Dera saccha sauda

He is sikh not hindu .

Yes liberals and muslim do this all the time. Above commentor was also implying this . You are also one . 

>So tell me are Muslims bad for making someone imaam

yes bcz imam is holy job like priest  making a rapist a imam is what they did .  it was a family member who garlanded the rapist of gujrat riot we are not making them priest either

He used to work for government not like muslim Terrorist mukhtar ansari and antique ahmed who used to get funds from isi and was literally a mass murderer and killer .

who rape and become imam the closest to Allah .

Odd day sikhs are still Hindu, even days they are separate.

> Yes liberals and muslim do this all the time. Above commentor was also implying this . You are also one.

Donâ€™t care about liberals as we donâ€™t align with them.  I donâ€™t know what about commentator was Implying, seems he deleted his comment. I implied to give you a taste of your own medicine.

> yes bcz imam is holy job like priest  making a rapist a imam is what they did .  it was a family member who garlanded the rapist of gujrat riot we are not making them priest either

Since you want me to type it out! We Muslims too condemn such acts. But you see how the generalisation is at work! The rapists were garlanded by a family memeber you say ignoring that an entire state machinery was complicit in his release!!! Since I have made my point on generalisation of community, will my saying which community is ruling in Gujarat make sense?? No! Because no matter the ruling group one cannot generalise an entire community as â€œrapist supporters â€œ

> He used to work for government not like muslim Terrorist mukhtar ansari and antique ahmed who used to get funds from isi and was literally a mass murderer and killer .

Look at you defending a criminal turned politician while adding â€œMuslimâ€ terrorist to show a religion!! The sheer audacity!
Fun fact about Hari Shankar Tiwari - he was the first person in Indian politics to win elections from PRISON!! now who votes for criminal gangster terrorist in prison any prizes for guessing this community! Wait Iâ€™ll spell for you, â€œHINDUâ€. Kill Mukhtar Ansari all you want, if you are a criminal you should suffer the consequences.

> He is disgusting just like imams . who rape and become imam the closest to Allah .

The masses flock them thinking that our pure imam/godmens are being targeted and maligned. They feed lies and deceit to thrive and make these gullibles their follower.

Both communities do not support criminals! The underlying facts and ground reality varies when half a picture is given! Just like how you point fingers on Muslim, be assured there are similar cases of Hindus in the news!

Peace

All five accused were arrested on Saturday. The mother told police that her minor daughter, who was at her grandmotherâ€™s residence near Raji Chauraha, was kidnapped on February 2 by five youths from the neighbourhood, who converted her to their religion and gang-raped her. A case was registered and Superintendent of Police (SP) Vrinda Shukla along with other officers visited the site and gave directions for evidence collection and stringent action against the accused. The girl said that the youths had threatened to kill her if she spoke up. The accused â€” **Anees, Saddam, Mohiuddeen, Aleem and Baura** â€” were taken into custody and legal proceedings have been initiated against them under sections 363, 342, 376-D, 506, of IPC, the SP said on Sunday. The girl will be sent for medical examination. ​
